name: Aliens Attack!
description:
This is a 2D Shooter game Project, the name of the game is Aliens Attack!

I do not remember every modification I have made but I will try to,

- I have modified the menu background, added buttons to level 2, level 3 and an additional level named freestyle.

- I also made every level harder than the last by adding different sets of enemies.

- I modified a new script and added a "enemies to defeat" at each level which tells you how many enemies you should defeat to win.

- I added a restart level button after losing a level.

- I added my logo at the beginning of the game after made by unity.

Created by:

Hatoon Alhudaib
